goals.active: Study the artifact detected by the VOED.
goals.complete: My krewe was preparing to study the artifact detected by the VOED when the Inquest stormed our lab and threatened everyone in the area if we didn't hand it over. We did, but they didn't realize the VOED gives us an edge: namely, it can lead us to the other pieces of the artifact before they ever get close. We decided to secure the other pieces and then steal the one they extorted from us back.
